quality_assessment: Documentation is comprehensive and accurate for backoff strategies. Contains broken internal links to non-existent subsections that need to be addressed. Implementation details are well-documented with proper source references.

issues.description: Found 2 broken internal links to non-existent subsections
issues.fix_suggestion: Either create the missing subsections (basic-retry-configuration.md and timeout-configuration.md) or remove the links from the 'See Also' section until those subsections are written. These appear to be planned documentation that hasn't been created yet.

issues.description: Documentation mentions Custom backoff uses max_delay when delays array is empty or attempt exceeds length, but doesn't explain this is intentional design
issues.current_content:
Empty `delays` array: Uses `max_delay` for all attempts
Attempt exceeds array length: Uses `max_delay`
issues.should_be: Should clarify this is intentional fallback behavior to prevent undefined delay calculations
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a brief note explaining this is a safety fallback: 'This ensures predictable behavior when custom delays are exhausted or misconfigured.'
